dialogue.text: Hmm… that name isn’t ringing any bells. Are they someone up and coming?
Not that I know of. I’m not seeing anything in my quick searches.
I could try digging a little deeper… and that isn’t finding me much, either.
Closest thing I can see is the title of an old song by a very snazzy looking singer from across the ocean.
‘Bitter’ by Cappuccino, from about 26 years ago. It’s a song she wrote while she was pregnant apparently, named after and dedicated to her not-yet-born child.
This has to be what the chat is talking about, cause I’m not finding any other results for this name.
The guy this song’s named after might be making a name for themselves. Maybe someone local heard about them?
Maybe, but they’re VERY underground if that is the case.
Heck, looking into this Cappuccino lady some more, she hasn’t been seen in public for a long time, and Bitter was the last song she ever released.
She probably got busy being a parent once their kid was born, but usually you’ll hear something about them during or after that kind of stuff. Strange…
Let’s do some of our own research in our off time. I’ve been very interested in overseas music ever since I’ve started listening to Sweet.
If we find anything interesting, we'll report it to you all next time we're live!
